response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is an excellent chance to save $800 while securing a high-quality item that aligns perfectly with your requirements. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 7200}
